trans-unit.source: Represents a control primitive that handles the positioning and sizing of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control and two <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> controls that are used to set a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" />를 설정하는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> 컨트롤과 두 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> 컨트롤의 위치와 크기를 지정하는 컨트롤 기본 형식을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control does not have a default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.

Its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> is implemented as part of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> controls.
trans-unit.target: 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> 의 일부로 구현 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> control and two <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls that are used to change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> 컨트롤과 두 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> 변경 하는 데 사용 되는 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> 속성의는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> on a slider.
**A Track on a Slider**
![RepeatButton, Thumb](~/add/media/trackonslider.png "RepeatButton, Thumb")

The following table shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> properties that they automatically bind to.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 속성 및 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> 를 자동으로 바인딩하는 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: When either property changes, the bound property also changes.
trans-unit.target: 두 속성 중 하나가 변경 될 때 바인딩된 속성도 변경 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> property

The following table shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> properties to which they bind when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 속성 및 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 바인딩할 때 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 의 일부는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 제어 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 속성이 명시적으로 설정 되지 않은 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> property

The following table shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties and the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> properties to which they bind when a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> properties are not explicitly set.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 속성 및 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 바인딩할 때 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 의 일부는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 제어 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 속성이 명시적으로 설정 되지 않은 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> property
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> property

Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control bind with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: 또한는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> 에 대 한 속성의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> 에 대 한 제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 에 바인딩됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> 에 대 한 속성의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> 의 제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is used to scroll content, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control is proportional to the percentage of the content that appears in the viewable area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 의 크기, 콘텐츠를 스크롤 하는 데 사용는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 컨트롤은 표시 되는 영역 또는 뷰포트에 표시 되는 콘텐츠의 비율에 비례 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an example of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control that implements a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림의 예가 나와 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 구현 하는 컨트롤을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: **A ScrollBar that has a Track control**
![ScrollBar illlustration](~/add/media/scrollbargeneric.png "ScrollBar illlustration")
The following calculation is used to compute the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 계산은의 크기를 계산 하는 데 사용 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: thumbSize = (viewportSize/(maximum–minimum+viewportSize))×trackLength
The viewportSize parameter is the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property.
The maximum and minimum parameters correspond to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 에 해당 하는 최대 및 최소 매개 변수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> 속성 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the expression maximum–minimum+viewportSize is the size of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: 최대 식의 값-최소 + viewportSize 스크롤 가능한 콘텐츠가의 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: Note that the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property represents the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> when the content is scrolled to the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> 속성이 나타내는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 콘텐츠 아래쪽으로 스크롤 되 면입니다.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value is not the same as the length or extent of the content.
trans-unit.target: 이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> 값이 동일한 길이 나 범위 콘텐츠의으로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For a more detailed explanation, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increases from top to bottom or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 위쪽에서 아래쪽 또는 왼쪽에서 오른쪽 방향에 따라 증가 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> increases from bottom to top or from left to right depending on the orientation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>.
trans-unit.target: 마찬가지로,는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 아래쪽에서 위쪽으로 또는 왼쪽에서 오른쪽 방향에 따라 증가 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>합니다.

trans-unit.source: To change the direction of increasing value, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 값이 늘어나는 방향을 변경 하려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 를 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to define a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 정의 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 컨트롤에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> class.
The area that is provided for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
Creates the layout for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> to use for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> content.

Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> that decreases the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> that reduces the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> control when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> is pressed.
The default is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> control that has default settings.

When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 컨트롤이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 컨트롤은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> 의 제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 바인딩할는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> 속성의는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> styles are defined inside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control template when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제와 방법을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> 스타일은 내부 정의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 컨트롤 템플릿 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>합니다.

trans-unit.source: For the complete sample, see the [ScrollBar Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollbar-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 전체 샘플에 대 한 참조는 [스크롤 막대 스타일 및 템플릿](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/scrollbar-styles-and-templates.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the child.
Gets the child of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> at the specified index.
Returns the object of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> at the specified index in the list of visual child elements.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />의 시각적 자식 요소 목록에서 지정된 인덱스의 개체를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The index must be a number between zero (0) and the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount" /> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: 인덱스는 0부터 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount" /> 속성 값에서 1을 뺀 값 사이의 숫자여야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 자식 요소를 지정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 설정 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: 자식 요소에서 속성이 설정 된 순서로 인덱싱됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The specified index is greater than the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount" /> property minus one (1).
trans-unit.target: 지정된 인덱스가 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.VisualChildrenCount" /> 속성 값에서 1을 뺀 값보다 큰 경우

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> that increases the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> class.

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> that increases the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> control when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> is pressed.
The default is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton" /> control that has default settings.

When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> bind to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 컨트롤이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 컨트롤은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> 의 제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 바인딩할는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton.Delay%2A> 속성의는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> styles are defined inside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control template when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제와 방법을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> 스타일은 내부 정의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 컨트롤 템플릿 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the direction of increasing <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> is reversed from the default direction.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" />가 증가하는 방향이 기본 방향과 반대인지 여부를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton" /> exchanged positions and the direction of increasing value is reversed; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton" />과 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton" />의 위치가 서로 바뀌었으며 값이 증가하는 방향이 반전되었으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.

When the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> exchange places.
trans-unit.target: 때의 값 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> 로 설정 된 `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 위치를 교환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values increase from left to right for both horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 값이 왼쪽에서 오른쪽 가로 대 한 증가 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> values for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> increase from top to bottom, whereas for a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> these values increase from bottom to top.
trans-unit.target: 그러나는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 세로 값 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 반면 위쪽에서 아래쪽으로 증가 세로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 맨 아래에서 이러한 값이 증가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property to `true`, the direction of increasing value reverses.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> 속성을 `true`, 값이 늘어나는 방향을 반대로 바꿉니다.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 구현 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 의 일부로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 제어 하 고 명시적으로 설정 하지 않으면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성을는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IsDirectionReversed%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None

The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> property is defined inside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control template when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제와 방법을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> 속성은 내부 정의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 컨트롤 템플릿 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IsDirectionReversed%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets the maximum possible <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
The largest allowable <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
The default is 1.

When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 컨트롤이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> 제어 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성이 명시적으로 설정 되지 않은,이 속성에 자동으로 바인딩됩니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control is equivalent to the size of the scrollable content minus the size of the visible content area or viewport.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> 에 대 한 값을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 컨트롤은 스크롤 가능한 콘텐츠가 표시 또는 뷰포트 크기 뺀 크기와 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the size of the content is 100 and the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is 30, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property is 70.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 콘텐츠 크기는 100 이며의 크기는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> 속성은 30 일의 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> 속성은 70입니다.

trans-unit.source: This is true because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control corresponds to the position in the scrollable content that appears at the top of the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 현상은 때문에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> 의 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 뷰포트의 위쪽에 표시 되는 스크롤 가능한 콘텐츠의 위치에 해당 하는 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: When the content is scrolled to the very bottom in this example, 30 percent of the content still appears in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 이 예제에서는 맨 아래에 콘텐츠가 스크롤됩니다, 30%의 콘텐츠는 계속 뷰포트의에 나타납니다.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> that corresponds to the top of the viewport is 70, and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> value is 70.
trans-unit.target: 따라서는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> 에 해당 하는 70, 뷰포트 맨 위에 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> 값이 70입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> corresponds to a position in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림에서는 방법을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> 에서 위치에 해당 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ![Value corresponds to the position of the content](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "Value corresponds to the position of the content")
trans-unit.target: ![콘텐츠 위치에 해당 하는 값](~/add/media/scrollbarvalueeqmaximum.png "콘텐츠 위치에 해당 값")

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`

The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> that becomes the binding source for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> 속성에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 에 대 한 바인딩 소스 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> dependency property.
The size of the available space for the track.
trans-unit.target: 트랙에 사용할 수 있는 공간 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: Measures the layout size that is required for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> and its components.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 및 해당 구성 요소에 필요한 레이아웃 크기를 측정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The layout <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> that is required by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
Gets or sets the minimum possible <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
The smallest allowable <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
The default is 0.

When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 컨트롤이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> 제어 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성이 명시적으로 설정 되지 않은,이 속성에 자동으로 바인딩됩니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`

The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> property for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> that becomes the binding source for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> 속성에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 에 대 한 바인딩 소스 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> is displayed horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />이 가로 방향으로 표시될지 아니면 세로 방향으로 표시될지를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" /> enumeration value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> is displayed horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation" />이 가로 방향으로 표시될지 아니면 세로 방향으로 표시될지를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Horizontal" />.

If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 구현 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 의 일부로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 제어 하 고 명시적으로 설정 하지 않으면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control and you do not explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 구현 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 의 일부로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 제어 하 고 명시적으로 설정 하지 않으면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.Orientation%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> dependency property.

Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control that is used to change the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control that is used with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
The default is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> control that has default settings.

The placement of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control.
trans-unit.target: 배치는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 컨트롤에 해당 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control reflects the amount of content that is currently visible.
trans-unit.target: 크기는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 컨트롤에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 컨트롤이 현재 표시 되는 콘텐츠 양을 반영 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is computed in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 크기는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 제어는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 다음과 같은 방법으로 계산 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is not specified, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> is a fixed default value.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> 속성을 지정 하지 않으면의 크기는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 고정된 기본값입니다.

trans-unit.source: This is how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> of a Track functions inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
trans-unit.target: 이것은 방법을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 트랙의 내부 함수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is specified and the size of the content is greater than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>, the following formula is used:
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> 속성이 지정 되어 있고 콘텐츠 크기 보다 크면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>, 다음 수식을 사용 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ThumbSize = TrackLength * ViewportSize / (Maximum – Minimum + ViewportSize)
trans-unit.target: 엄지 단추 크기 TrackLength = * ViewportSize / (최대 – 최소 + ViewportSize)

trans-unit.source: Where the parameters are defined as follows:
trans-unit.target: 여기서 매개 변수는 다음과 같이 정의 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: ThumbSize
The size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in the same units as the TrackLength.
trans-unit.target: 크기는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 는 TrackLength로는 같은 단위로 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: TrackLength
The length of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>.
ViewportSize
The size of the scrollable area that is visible in the content units, such as the number of pages of a document.
trans-unit.target: 문서 페이지 수와 같은 콘텐츠 단위로 표시 되는 스크롤 가능한 영역의 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: Maximum
The maximum value of the content in content units, such as page 10 of a 10-page document.
trans-unit.target: 10 페이지 문서 10 페이지와 같은 콘텐츠 단위에 있는 콘텐츠의 최대 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Minimum
The minimum value of the content in content units, such as page 1 of a document.
trans-unit.target: 문서의 1 페이지와 같은 콘텐츠 단위에 있는 콘텐츠의 최소 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a visual representation of some of these parameters in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림에 이러한 매개 변수 중 일부의 시각적 표현이 표시는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ![Viewport size, thumb size, and track length](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsizemath.png "Viewport size, thumb size, and track length")
trans-unit.target: ![Viewport 크기, 엄지 단추 크기 및 추적 길이](~/add/media/scrollbarthumbsizemath.png "Viewport 크기, 엄지 단추 크기 및 추적 길이")

trans-unit.source: If the size of the content is less than a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> does not appear and the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 콘텐츠의 크기가 미만 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 나타나지 않으면 및 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Visibility%2A> 속성의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 로 설정 되어 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The minimum sizes for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control are determined by two system parameters, <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.VerticalScrollBarButtonHeight%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.HorizontalScrollBarThumbWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 최소 크기는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 컨트롤 두 시스템 매개 변수에 의해 결정 됩니다 <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.VerticalScrollBarButtonHeight%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.HorizontalScrollBarThumbWidth%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The minimum size for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a vertical <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is 1/2 * <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.VerticalScrollBarButtonHeight%2A> and the minimum size for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a horizontal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> is 1/2 * <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.HorizontalScrollBarThumbWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 최소 크기는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 컨트롤에 세로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 는 1/2 * <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.VerticalScrollBarButtonHeight%2A> 및 최소 크기를는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 가로에서 컨트롤 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 는 1/2 * <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.HorizontalScrollBarThumbWidth%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> style is defined inside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제와 방법을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 스타일은 내부 정의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Orientation%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Orientation.Vertical>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> as determined by the position of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> 컨트롤의 위치에 따라 결정되는 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />의 현재 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The current value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
The default is 0.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> represents a value that is between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> 사이 있는 값을 나타내는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Minimum%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Maximum%2A> 속성 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control is part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is not explicitly set, this property automatically binds with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 컨트롤은의 일부는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> 제어 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성이 명시적으로 설정 되지 않은,이 속성에 자동으로 바인딩됩니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.BindsTwoWayByDefault%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsArrange%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Journal%2A>
The horizontal displacement of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />.
The vertical displacement of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" />.

Calculates the change in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" /> when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> moves.

The change in <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> that corresponds to the displacement of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
The specified point.
Calculates the distance from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb" /> to a specified point along the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
The distance between the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb" /> and the specified <paramref name="pt" /> value.
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Value%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets the size of the part of the scrollable content that is visible.
trans-unit.target: 스크롤할 수 있는 내용 중 표시되는 부분의 크기를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The size of the visible area of the scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: 스크롤할 수 있는 내용 중 표시되는 영역의 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />, which means that the content size is not defined.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 내용 크기가 정의되지 않았음을 의미하는 <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property is used to calculate the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> is not <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> 속성은의 크기를 계산 하는 데 사용 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 컨트롤에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> 않습니다 <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the remarks for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 설명 부분을 참조 하십시오.는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: To explicitly define the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>, create an object that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> class and provide overrides for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 크기를 명시적으로 정의 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>에서 파생 되는 개체를 만들는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 클래스에 대 한 재정의 설명과 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.MeasureOverride%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ArrangeOverride%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If you implement a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> control and you do not explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property binds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 구현 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 의 일부로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> 제어 하 고 명시적으로 설정 하지 않으면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성을는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ViewportSize%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> control that is implemented in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control is always <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>, because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> control does not change size.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> 속성의는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 컨트롤에서 구현 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> 컨트롤은 항상 <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>때문에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A> 컨트롤 크기를 변경 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.ViewportSize%2A> dependency property.
Gets the number of child elements of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
An integer between 0 and 2 that specifies the number of child elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track" />의 자식 요소 수를 나타내는 0에서 2 사이의 정수입니다.

trans-unit.source: You specify the child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 자식 요소를 지정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> 설정 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.Thumb%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.DecreaseRepeatButton%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track.IncreaseRepeatButton%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The child elements are indexed in the order that the properties are set.
trans-unit.target: 자식 요소에서 속성이 설정 된 순서로 인덱싱됩니다.
